instructions: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Voice Control. Adjust any of the following: Show Confirmation: When iPhone recognizes a command, a visual confirmation appears at the top of the screen. Play Sound: When iPhone recognizes a command, an audible sound is played. Show Hints: See command suggestions and hints. Overlay: Display numbers, names, or a grid over screen elements. Attention Aware: Voice Control wakes up when you look at your iPhone and goes to sleep when you look away. To teach Voice Control new words, tap Vocabulary.
